data.title: 62. Diocese of San Fernando de La Union
data.text:
Dioecesis Ferdinandopolitana ab Unione

Suffragan of Lingayen- Dagupan

Created: January 19, 1970. Erected: April 11, 1970 Comprises

the Civil Province of La Union. Titular: St. William the Hermit,

February 10.

Bishop

Most Reverend

DANIEL OCA PRESTO, DD

Date of Birth: April 7, 1963. Place of Birth: Mangaldan, Pangasinan. Date of

Presbyteral Ordination: December 1, 1990. Date of Episcopal Ordination:

July 30, 2018. Appointed: May 9, 2018. Installed: August 2, 2018.

Address:

No. 7 P. Gomez Street, Brgy. II, San Fernando City, La Union

Postal Address:

Diocesan Center, No. 7 P. Gomez Street,

Brgy. II, San Fernando City, 2500 La Union

Tel.: (072) 609-2396; 619-7863

Email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

Official Facebook page:

Roman Catholic Diocese of San Fernando de La Union (DSFLU)

Past Bishops:

Most Rev. Victorino Cristobal Ligot

February 6, 1970 to September 18, 1980

Most Rev. Salvador Lazo Lazo

January 20, 1981 to May 28, 1993

Most Rev. Antonio Realubin Tobias

May 28, 1993 to November 25, 2003

Most Rev. Artemio Lomboy Rillera, SVD

April 01, 2005 to November 13, 2011

Most Rev. Rodolfo Fontiveros Beltran

January 18, 2013 to June 17, 2017
